title: Snipp, Snapp, Snurr and the Red Shoes
description: One day the three boys decided to buy their mother the perfect birthday presentâ€•a pair of red shoes. They set out to earn some money. Snipp painted a fence; Snapp cleaned a chimney; and Snurr worked in a flour mill. Things did not go exactly as planned, but in the end, Mother was very surprised!
author: Maj Lindman
